title: FastAPI app and GraphQL router
description: Implement `app/main.py` with FastAPI app factory. Create app = FastAPI(title='Find Your Tribe API'). Import schema from graphql.schema and context_getter from graphql.context. Create GraphQLRouter with schema and context_getter. Include router at /graphql prefix. Add CORS middleware allowing localhost:3000 origin with credentials. Add startup event to verify DB connection.
acceptance_criteria:
- FastAPI app created with correct title
- GraphQLRouter mounted at /graphql
- CORS middleware configured for localhost:3000
- context_getter properly integrated
- App can be imported and run with uvicorn
- GraphQL playground accessible
